title: Problem with solo queue !!!
body:
Hi everyone i'm actually on the new launcher and i saw that ranked solo queue are back,
SO i wanna play but when i try to lock a champ (any champ) i can't so i tried to spam the "lock" but nothing happend i tried on the old launcher but happend again ... i already lost 6lp it's not that much but that's anoying i also can't play for 30 min D: so if you can fix it :p

DefiniteIyNotMid on lol hope it will be solved lp aren't a problem tho don't worry :p

 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the matchmaking servers is unstable, which would cause your packets (little bits of data) to not reach the server to confirm that champion lock-in button. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League and aren't the cause of this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
The launcher is even faster idc why ^^ it react much faster :p
